sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Halting stigmatiz'd in a sermon preached to the Honorable House of Commons on the monethly fast day, Octob. 25. 1643. at Margarets Westminster. By Arthur Salvvey, pastour of Severne-stoake in the county of Worcester. Published by order of the said House. Salwey, Arthur, b. 1605 or 6.
[8], 21, [1] p.
Printed for Christopher Meredith at the Crane in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1644.
With an order to print on verso of first leaf. Running title reads: A sermon preached at a late fast before the Honourable House of Commons. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[8], 21, [1] p.
Printed for Christopher Meredith at the Crane in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1644.
With an order to print on verso of first leaf. Running title reads: A sermon preached at a late fast before the Honourable House of Commons. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Christopher Meredith
the Crane in Pauls Church-yard
